sources.title: Good-bye Love
sources.description: Title: Good-bye Love Summary: A sexy golddigger lands who she thinks is a wealthy big-game hunter from a royal family. What she doesn't know is that not only is he not wealthy, nor a big-game hunter nor from a royal ... Directed by: H. Bruce Humberstone Actors: Production Company: Jefferson Pictures Corporation Release Date: 10 November 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A sexy golddigger lands who she thinks is a wealthy big-game hunter from a royal family. What she doesn't know is that not only is he not wealthy, nor a big-game hunter nor from a royal family, but he's only a butler. Complications ensue as he tries to keep up the pretense.

metadata.Plot: A sexy golddigger lands who she thinks is a wealthy big-game hunter from a royal family. What she doesn't know is that not only is he not wealthy, nor a big-game hunter nor from a royal family, but he's only a butler. Complications ensue as he tries to keep up the pretense.
metadata.Writer: Hampton Del Ruth, George Rosener, John Howard Lawson
metadata.Actors: Charles Ruggles, Verree Teasdale, Sidney Blackmer
